    • Constructor Detail

      • Customer

        public Customer(int id,
                java.lang.String name,
                Address address,
                java.lang.Boolean active,
                java.sql.Timestamp createDate,
                java.lang.String creatorName,
                java.sql.Timestamp updateDate,
                java.lang.String updatorName)
        Creates an instance of a Customer object based on the uCertify database model.
        Parameters:
        id - - an int representing the customer id number
        name - - a String representing the customer name
        address - - an instance of an Address object representing the address for the given customer
        active - - a Boolean, true if the customer is active and false if the customer in inactive
        createDate - - a Timestamp object representing the date and time the database record was created
        creatorName - - a String representing the name of the database user who created the record
        updateDate - - a Timestamp object representing the date and time that the database record was last updated.
        updatorName - - a String representing the name of the database user who last updated the record.

      • createCustomerInstanceFromHashMap

        public static Customer createCustomerInstanceFromHashMap(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> data)
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates and returns an instance of a Customer object based on the paired values in a HashMap, where the key is a String representing the names of variables of a Customer object and the values are the values to be assigned to those variables.
        Parameters:
        data - a HashMap representing the data to be used, where the keys are the names of the variables in a Customer object, and the values are Object instances representing the values to be passed. If the values are not instances of the correct type, the data will not be accepted and an exception will be thrown.
        Returns:
        a Customer instance that contains the data that was passed into the method.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
